attributes.title: Send help
attributes.review:
With this app comes disaster.
 So I decided to download this app to support annoying orang- I mean president trump, but when I was about to click get, no lie the ghost of one George Washington appeared in front of my face. Scared me half to death. But anyway, he was begging me to not download the app and in fact vote blue, but I told him, ”Mr. Washington, with all do respect, Donald Trump has done more for America than even you!” So, amongst his cries of “VOTE BLUE!”, I downloaded the app.
 But the second that I did so, (I heard that this happened to someone else as well) many ninjas burst into my house, breaking several windows, screaming to leave a five star review! And when I didn’t answer because I was so shocked they began to attack! I fought long and hard, but it wasn’t enough and I ended up tied up in the basement. They untied me because of good behavior (after several days) and gave me my phone back because I promised to leave a 5 star review, and that’s my current predicament. Right now, I’m locked in a basement with George Washington (I didn’t forget) giving me a pep talk about why I should’ve listened to him yada yada yada, and many ninjas are just living in my house! When they find out that I wrote a one star review they will probably kill me (the leader seemed a little hostile toward me, probably because I’m not orange like all of them). 
 I write this review in hopes that it will prevent someone from going through the same thing that I am going through. I hope that I make it out alive. And with that I bid you adieu.
